column2: Arcus Biosciences, Inc. engages in the development and commercialization of immunotherapies. The company is headquartered in Hayward, California and currently employs 108 full-time employees. The firm is focused on the discovery and development of cancer immunotherapy. Its pipeline includes AB928, AB680, AB122, and AB154. AB928 is a potent and selective dual antagonist of the adenosine receptors known as A2aR and A2bR.It is in the Phase-I clinical trial. AB680 is a potent and selective inhibitor of CD73 and is in the pre-clinical stage of development. AB122 is an anti-PD-1 antibody and is in the Phase-I dose-escalation trial. AB154 is a humanized anti-TIGIT antibody.
